[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@remirror/core-extensions](./core-extensions.md) &gt; [baseExtensions](./core-extensions.baseextensions.md)

## baseExtensions variable

Base extensions are automatically injected into the default RemirrorEditor.

To override them, you can either add your own extension with the same extensionName or you can turn off all of the base extensions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
baseExtensions: ({
    extension: DocExtension;
    priority: number;
} | {
    extension: TextExtension;
    priority: number;
} | {
    extension: ParagraphExtension;
    priority: number;
} | {
    extension: HistoryExtension;
    priority: number;
} | {
    extension: CompositionExtension;
    priority: number;
} | {
    extension: GapCursorExtension;
    priority: number;
} | {
    extension: DropCursorExtension;
    priority: number;
} | {
    extension: BaseKeymapExtension;
    priority: number;
})[]
```
